column2: Discounts, new items, and limited-time offers.
While your griffon dives, release [lbracket]%str1%[rbracket] to end the dive and level out. Use this to maintain speed and to reach distant checkpoints.

Shrine of Air+2 War Score on Capture• Grants a blessing on interact.
• Grants a bonus to the nearest keep if controlled by the same team.
• 1 Shrine: Activates air jump pads.
• 2 Shrines: Activates the Windfall effect.
• 3 Shrines: Activates the eagle clouds.
Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 7
Learn to nimbly recover after being knocked off the skimmer and after engaging foes by using Barrel Roll. The skimmer will now grant you protection and swiftness when you're recovering.

Double-click to activate the relic. It can offer wishes in exchange for Eyes of Kormir, and it can also return you to Spearmarshal's Lament.
Spread poison to White Mantle food stores. Disguise is removed if witnessed.
Learn to ride the wind and increase the height of the hover movement ability to conquer new challenges.
